theorem.name: len_inductive_clause

text.english:
Inductive clause of definition of \(\texttt{len}\):

\[ \forall (l1 : L_{\mathbb N}), (a : \mathbb N) . \texttt{len}(a :: l_1) = \texttt{len}(l_1) + 1 \]
text.italiano:
Clausola Induttiva della definizione di \(\texttt{len}\):

\[ \forall (l1 : L_{\mathbb N}), (a : \mathbb N) . \texttt{len}(a :: l_1) = \texttt{len}(l_1) + 1 \]

theorem.coq:
Theorem len_inductive_clause : forall (l1 : list nat) (a : nat), len (a :: l1) = len (l1) + 1.
Proof.
Admitted.
